# device

**Instance Property**

The device object that created the sampler.

## Declaration

```swift
var device: any MTLDevice { get }
```

## Discussion

A sampler is always associated with the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice] that created it and can be used only with that device.

## Identifying the sampler

- **label**: A string that identifies the sampler.
